name: Holiday Inn Express Lake Wales N - Winter Haven

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are from the NOVA/DC area, so we have high standards, this place was very nice, we were in the area to do some flying on seaplanes and basically check out the area for future reference, and we had a small 13lb dog, which was ok at this location, very clean room, nice location, nice breakfast to get the day started, good location for Legoland and Bok Tower, also right next to Kohls if you need to do a little shopping in walking distance. Mattress was very comfortable. Nice little clean pool also.
reviews.title: Very clean, felt safe

reviews.text: We stayed here to go to Legoland.It is a really nice hotel, clean, good service and it is not too far from the park and the restaurant.Park is about 8 miles away and restaurants and the mall are close by too.
reviews.title: Good choice for Legoland
Great for budget hotel
reviews.text: The only thing was the breakfast: only few choices,bakery items were quite old but overall got us fed for the long day.
I asked for the Legoland special, after I checked somebody's review on tripadvisor, and they actually had a very good price of $89/night which made our trip a little more affordable.
reviews.title: Don't expect a hot breakfast

reviews.text: We will definetevely go back.
reviews.title: Best place to stay for Lego Land

reviews.text: We have annual passes for Legoland so we decided to stay close to the park for the weekend. This hotel was wonderful. We have 4 kids and they loved the hot breakfast. Ive never stayed at a hotel that offered so much for our family. The kids loved the fresh hot pancakes and they even had chocolate milk. The hotel was fresh and clean smelling. The staff was pleasant and helpful. The rooms were spacious and comfortable. When your traveling with children a microwave and fridge is a neccessity, they not only have that in the rooms but a dvd player and free movies. I could not have asked for a better weekend. Then when we checked out, they told us about there May LegoLand rates and since we have annual passes, $89 a night is so worth the stay. My kids have been raving about there new hotel for legoland visits. We look forward to staying again in May when legolands water park opens.
reviews.title: FAMILY LEGOLAND TRIP

reviews.text: Stayed here just one night before our visit to Legoland. The room was clean and elegant with premium linens and a variety of pillow choices (labeled firm, soft, etc.). There was a fridge, microwave and flat screen TV and the bathroom was clean and spacious. No noise problems to speak of but we did check in late (around 11:45pm). The desk person was pleasant and the housekeeping staff (next morning) were cheerful and helpful. The breakfast was standard with many choices; cereal, pastries, yogurt, pancake station, eggs, biscuits, toast, muffins and bananas. A few other fruit selections would have been nice. We did not stay long enough to use the pool, but they did have one. Overall a really excellent, clean place to stay!
reviews.title: Nice clean hotel-right near Legoland!

reviews.text: This is an above average Holiday Inn Express. It is quite new and is in very good shape as of March, 2012. The value was good, the room very clean, the staff responsive, and the breakfast was well above average for this type of hotel. The only negative is that there aren't many restaurant choices in the immediate area. That really shouldn't reflect on the hotel though as it is a very good property that exceeds the standard in all areas.
reviews.title: Nice and New
Great idea for Legoland stay
reviews.text: In order to get an early start at Legoland, we stayed here. It was a great idea. The beds were comfortable, the pillows were just right, and the breakfast was just perfect. It was clean, as expected from Holiday Inn brands. It was a 5 minute drive from the hotel to the park. It was a much better plan than staying in Orlando then driving the 45 minutes. I definitely recommend the stay.

Was in town for a wedding and stayed here based on other reviews I read. I was not disappointed HIE has got it right at this location, clean rooms, friendly staff, comfy beds, only thing the room was a little musty smelling. We brought a cool air humidifier for our 5 month old son and that seem to fix that issue. Overall great stay!!!!!
reviews.title: In town for a wedding!!!

reviews.text: My son and I spent three nights here 5th Aug - 8th Aug '12. Our room was very spacious with great decor, furnishings and very clean especially the bathroom. The bed was the biggest I have slept in and it was very comfortable, there was also an assortment of five pillows on the bed some firm and some soft. There is a fridge, microwave, large flat screen tv with plenty of channels and free wi-fi. There is a small pool which provides relief from the heat and the hotel provide large fluffy towels for the guests. A complimentary breakfast is served each morning which is quite good - try the warm cinnamon buns they are delicious!!! There are plenty of eating places by the hotel and also a shopping mall (which is average). There is also a Publix and Walmart supercentre nearby. The main attraction in this area is Legoland and it is only a 10 min drive from the hotel. All the staff here were friendly and polite and I would stay here again when passing through.
reviews.title: Fantastic stay

reviews.text: After a horrible experience at a hotel in Winter Haven, my husband and I found this Holiday Inn Express and what a relief! The hotel was clean, room was nice and service was good. The breakfast was just ok but I definitely recommend staying here!
reviews.title: Relief

reviews.text: Stayed here on August 1 after a trip to Legoland. Very short driving distance between the two. Usually stay at HI express on our trips.(We continued our vacation in Orlando at a HI express in Lake Buena Vista which left more to be desired) Lake Wales HI express was by far one of, or if not the best, in regards to the room/bathroom that I've stayed at. Very spacious and modern. Convenient fridge, microwave. Breakfast was good, except a bit disappointing since they did not serve the cinnamon rolls that morning. Definitely a good value, save yourself some $ by staying here instead of those older, pricier hotels that are in walking distance from Legoland.
reviews.title: Modern, clean

reviews.text: Stayed here to take my kids to Legoland...room was musty, pillows were lumpy, bathroom had hair. The housekeepers were friendly but certainly not the breakfast host. We kept on having to ask her for items that were finished on the bar and she would get annoyed. She needed a second person to help her as she was clearly overwhelmed. The location is good and the area attractions are nice. Not sure about the hotel though!
reviews.title: Average Stay

reviews.text: This hotel sits behind a gas station, is in front of a Kohl's Department Store, and next to a Publix Shopping Center filled with restaurants and stores. Everything is within a 5-minute walk.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Great Location!

reviews.text: We decided last minute to take a mini vacation to Seaworld & Legoland for New Year's. Our last visit to Legoland we stayed @ Holiday Inn closest to Legoland. We decided to try Holiday Inn Express. The rooms, we had two, as it was my son, his wife & three children, ages 5, 2, & an infant in one room with 2 Queen beds & a crib. We had a King bed. The rooms were nice & comfortable beds. We wanted connecting rooms but were told they only had two & both were taken. Jeanette said she would try to get us close to each other. We were given rooms right next to each other. Thanks Jeanette. The rooms have a small microwave & refrigerator. The bathrooms were nice & complimentary toiletries were given. Towels were in very good condition. The hotel is about a 40 minute ride from Seaworld & about 7 minutes to Legoland. They also have complimentary breakfast 6am to 9am. Good for free. One morning we had a gentleman who was very nice & made my grandson more sausages when none were there. Next morning was a woman who was always filling the breakfast bar. They have a machine that made pancakes which were pretty good. It's free & good. Chocolate chip cookies were @ the front desk the second evening.
reviews.title: Mini vacation

reviews.text: The directive was clear! I needed decent en-suite accommodation near Orlando and The Ranch in Lake Wales that would not break the bank and allow me to spend my hard earned cash on seeing Florida.
reviews.title: Ticked all the boxes!

reviews.text: The room was huge and well maintained. My bathroom was perfectly adequate and the reception team were extremely friendly and helpful!
reviews.title: EXCELLENT!

reviews.text: I spent almost two weeks here and found the bed extremely comfortable.
reviews.title: very nice HIE; quiet and clean

reviews.text: My husband and I have been staying at this property every year for the past five years and love it. The property is very well taken care of and managed. Our rooms have been spotlessly clean every time. It sits enough back from the highway that road noise is not a problem. The staff always fulfills every request - - room placement, wake up call, quality breakfast, etc. This property definitely has it going on. Be sure and eat at The Sizzler just south of the property on the opposite side of the street. You won't be disappointed.
reviews.title: Good Legoland trip choice

aka: Holiday Inn Express Lake Wales n - Winter Haven Hotel
description: The Holiday Inn Express - Lake Wales is a brand new 82 room, interior entrance, hotel that offers a hassle-free guest experience, that will make you feel like you are visiting home instead of being on the road.
